The Bone Snatcher is about a group miners who go on a search for a missing crew of miners in the Namib Desert. When the find them, they do not realize that what was going on with them is going to happen to them and may be occurring all around Africa.
Writers: Frank E Flowers, James Hart

Michael Dudikoff stars as Joe Armstrong a martial artist who fights ninjas who are stealing weapons from the U.S Army, in this entertaining yet admittedly brainless comedic action film. This film is clearly an attempt to catch the success of The A-Team and Commando, but it ultimately fails to deliver due to its lack of realism and thick story line. Despite it is obvious flaws, there are a lot of fun moments and enjoyable characters found loveable throughout.
